p.4: Software Engineer (Algorithmic Trading) / Software Developer (Algorithmic Trading)
p.5: We are currently seeking a productive professional to join our team. The candidate will play a substantial role in designing the day to day operations of our program. The ideal candidate will be a strong team player, detail oriented, strategic, and have a strong experience in the dynamics of in equities and options in the stock market. This offer will be a permanent position for talented individuals.
p.7: Job responsibilities include, but are not limited to:
p.8: =E2=80=A2 Writing projects, details, goals, timelines, and evaluating productivity, performance and progress of the project
p.9: =E2=80=A2 Evaluating and analyzing data to formulate and synthesize strategies or models for stocks or options
p.10: =E2=80=A2 Evaluating and analyzing data, to assist with the preparation and processing of new investments plans
p.11: =E2=80=A2 Helping to refine and improve processing of stocks and options exercises, ensuring execution on time and execution of the strategies precisely and accurately
p.12: =E2=80=A2 Helping to build low latency liquidity taking or market making strategies from beginning-to-end
p.13: =E2=80=A2 Building metrics, variables to evaluate strategy execution and perform post trade analysis
p.14: =E2=80=A2 Work with traders and developers to identify and add new signals into strategies
p.15: =E2=80=A2 Identifying and implementing infrastructure improvements to minimize overall latency and maximize performance
p.16: =E2=80=A2 Collaborating with researchers and developers to implement all of the above while evaluating performance of team members
p.18: =E2=80=A2 Bank Quantitative Analysis =E2=80=93 Knowledge of and ability to use numerical methods to develop statistical models for devising strategies
p.19: =E2=80=A2 Quantitative Techniques =E2=80=93 Knowledge of and ability to use quantitative tools and techniques to measure and analyze risks.
p.20: =E2=80=A2 Consulting =E2=80=93 Knowledge of techniques, roles, and responsibilities in providing technical or business guidance to clients, both internal and external; ability to apply this knowledge appropriately to diverse situations.
p.21: =E2=80=A2 Data Gathering and Reporting =E2=80=93 Knowledge of and ability to utilize tools, techniques and processes for gathering and reporting data in a particular department or division of a company.
p.22: =E2=80=A2 Testing =E2=80=93 Knowledge of and ability to plan, implement and manage testing strategies, policies and practices that assure the delivery of high quality applications.
p.23: =E2=80=A2 Participate in the full life-cycle workflow from hypothesis formulation, research and prototyping through to production release.
p.26: =E2=80=A2 Expertise or strong experience in equity and/or options
p.27: =E2=80=A2 Experience with TD AmeriTrade / Robinhood / Interactive Broker platforms
p.28: =E2=80=A2 Experience in trading equity or options with strategies or algorithms
p.32: =E2=80=A2 Understanding of fundamentals in dynamics of stocks and options, different technical indicators, and signals
p.33: =E2=80=A2 Understanding of qualitative and quantitative analytical methods, approaches and tactics
p.34: =E2=80=A2 Problem-solving skills to develop process solutions
p.35: =E2=80=A2 Strong analytical and writing skills to create compelling business solutions based on complex business environments and inputs
p.36: =E2=80=A2 Reliable, alert, self-motivated, flexible, deadline and detail oriented, and can complete multiple tasks timely and independently, with minimal supervision
p.37: =E2=80=A2 A compliance and process-minded individual that is flexible and can excel in a fast-paced and rapidly evolving work environment
p.38: =E2=80=A2 A team player with a strong work ethic and ability to complete projects timely and accurately
p.39: =E2=80=A2 Able to maintain strict confidentiality in a very open and transparent environment
p.40: =E2=80=A2Experience in real time high performance systems using Java / C++ / C#
p.41: =E2=80=A2Able to think strategically and creatively when faced with problems and opportunities.
p.42: =E2=80=A2Able to communicate concepts and ideas, both verbally and via documentation, and be able to defend their validity and target messages to different audiences
p.43: =E2=80=A2Self-directed, highly motivated, and able to work independently. Be willing to change, grow, thrive and help team in making progress.
p.47: Accepted candidates must be willing to relocate to the headquarters in Bay Area, California.
p.55: The company is a research and development company with a unique approach to the markets. We employ quantitative methodologies to generate alpha and maximizing returns. We are an innovative firm with a strong focus on collaboration, cutting-edge technology, data driven solutions. We are seeking talented individuals to assist in building our platform.
p.56: Candidates can elevate their careers by joining the company, where they can thrive in an environment that fosters positive relationships and recognizes outstanding performance and celebrates accomplishments! We know candidates want to feel valued every single day and be recognized for their contribution. At our company, we strive to empower our employees and effectively engage involvement in its success and we strive to be the top and best organization in every way possible.
p.57: In hiring, we search for aptitude, character, enthusiasm, desire to learn, change, grow and thrive. We seek associates that learn quickly and are open to take on a variety of roles. We have a friendly and collaborative environment.
